name: Diana Inkpen
content: Diana Zaiu Inkpen Diana Inkpen Professor Ph.D. (University of Toronto) P.Eng. Research Interests: Version francaise Computational Linguistics / Natural Language Processing / Artificial Intelligence, more specifically: Natural Language Understanding and Generation, Lexical Semantics, Information Retrieval, Information Extraction, Automatic Text Classification, and Intelligent Agents for the Semantic Web. PUBLICATIONS Resources In the news I am the Director of the NLP Lab. More about my research (projects, graduate students, committee) I am organizing the TAMALE seminars Editor-in-Chief of the Computational Intelligence journal Teaching ITI 1120 (Introduction to Computing I), Fall 2013, Winter 2013, Fall 2011, Fall 2010, Winter 2010, Fall 2008, 2007, 2006 ITI 1520 (Introduction a l'Informatique I), Fall 2025, Fall 2024, Fall 2023, Fall 2022, Winter 2022, Winter 2020, Fall 2020, Winter 2020, Fall 2019, Fall 2017, Fall 2016, Fall 2015, Fall 2010 CSI 4107 (Information Retrieval and the Internet), Winter 2025, 2024, 2023, 2021, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012, 2011, 2009, 2008, 2007, 2006, 2005 CSI 5386 Natural Language Processing, Winter 2025, Winter 2024, Fall 2022, Winter 2022, Winter 2021, Winter 2019, Fall 2017, Winter 2016, Winter 2015, Winter 2014 CSI 5180 (Statistical Natural Language Processing), Winter 2012, 2011, 2010, 2009, 2008, 2007, Fall 2005, 2004 CSI 2165 (Prolog Concepts Laboratory), Winter 2006, Fall 2005 CSI 1102 (Fundamentals of Software Design), Winter 2005, 2004 CSI4900 honour's projects Diana Inkpen University of Ottawa School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science 800 King Edward, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1N 6N5 Tel: (613) 562-5800 ext. 6711, Fax: (613) 562-5664 Office: SITE, Room 5015 Email:  diana.inkpen@uottawa.ca See my former page at the University of Toronto.
